channel.title: Need cheat client help! <----------------
channel.description:
heey people this sound maybe stupid but i have some nasty problems with cheat clients specialy with bombs client i think.... on most servers they cant pickup stuff only atk npc ans noclip but on my server they can do spawning items and pickit up to :S so i need help i tryed the tut about UID but there was a problem i cant logg in anymore with that even on good client so i did go back to back ups... i need sirious help cuz they ruining my server
information: 317 server , delta , 2specced

item.title: Need cheat client help! <----------------
item.dc:creator: @mod_mortl mod mortl
item.description:
@mod_mortl wrote:

well i suggest that you look in all there banks when they are on take there items away and keep doing that or when u think one of them is doing that just shut ur server down for about 5 mins or so then reopen

that might stop them maybe i have never had that problem so i dont know how to really help srry

Read full topic

item.title: Need cheat client help! <----------------
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

You did something wrong on the UID tutorial then.
I just tested it on 2Speced, I had no issues.

Read full topic
